long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vybe converts your likes into crypto. It tokenizes them. Once a day, it excavates the likes you get on social media, tokenizes them into a cryptocurrency called VYBE, and automatically sends VYBE to your Algorand wallet, where you can hold, move or convert them to other assets. This makes it possible for creators to better control and monetize their content. With Vybe, you can mine your social media and get paid to post.
